channel.title: Flickr Album on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Flickr Album on jverkamp.com

item.title: A Short Stay in San Diego
item.description:
A quick work trip to San Diego. But hey, while we’re there, might as well go to the zoo!

View on Flickr

item.title: Eagle Creek Walks
item.description:
I’ve taken to walking the loop at the Eagle Creek Ornithology Center. A good two miles and so many things to take pictures of.

View on Flickr

item.title: A Short Return West
item.description:
Had the chance to return to the Bay Area for a week for work. Spent a few days exploring as well with our youngest.

View on Flickr

item.title: Return to Alcatraz
item.description:
A ’team building’ exercise with a twist.

View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Mill Spring 2023
item.description:
Another visit, this time for camping. It’s pretty there.

View on Flickr

item.title: Clifty Falls 2023
item.description:
Another visit to Clifty Falls. Got a year’s weather in 3 days. A nice warm start, a crazy rain, followed by a 30 degree temperature drop. Good to play games and enjoy the pool.

View on Flickr

item.title: Brown County in the Snow
item.description:
Stayed at the cabins near Abe Martin Lodge. Hiked, swam, explored. A good few days.

View on Flickr

item.title: McCormick's Creek 2023
item.description:
Another year, another first of the year hike. Much less flooded this time around, plus we stayed at the Inn. A great experience.

View on Flickr

item.title: On-Site in Austin
item.description:
Meeting the new team face to face. Took a few pictures along the way. A neat downtown. Reminds me of SF.

View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Mills 2022
item.description:
Another year, another Black Friday trip to Spring Mills. It’s beautiful in a stark kind of way this time of year. Always good for a few pictures.

View on Flickr

item.title: Natural Bridge
item.description:
A few days at Natural Bridge in Kentucky. Worth the drive. A lot of fun hikes, a neat sky bridge, and great fun all around.

View on Flickr

item.title: Cox Hall
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Another Turkey Run
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Mill Camping
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Clifty Falls
item.description:
A fun two nights at Clifty Falls Inn. Crazy time getting in with the ice–both main gates were closed (they hadn’t cleared the roads) and we had to go in the DNR service entrance. Worth it in the end though.

View on Flickr

item.title: Two Counties
item.description:
Travel for a funeral, take advantage of the beauty of cold nature and a camping trip to Brown County.

View on Flickr

item.title: McCormick's Creek 2022
item.description:
First day hike again! More of a first day play in the water with all the rain and flooding, but still a lot of fun.

View on Flickr

item.title: Eiteljorg Etc
item.description: Went to Jingle Rails at Eiteljorg and to the canal. A good day. View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Mills 2021
item.description: Another Black Friday, another day out of doors. Chilly, but still well worth the exploration. The kids had a blast. View on Flickr

item.title: Nature Friends at Holliday Park
item.description: Meeting up with friends, in Nature! Holliday Park is a wonderful find. View on Flickr

item.title: Nature Friends at Lilly Lake
item.description: More meeting up with friends, in Nature! This time at Lilly Lake (Eagle Creek Park). So pretty in the fall. View on Flickr

item.title: Adventures with Children
item.description: On leave with the newest addition, so I’m taking the older ones out and about to let mum and baby bond. Great times. Interesting pictures. View on Flickr

item.title: Hendricks County Fair
item.description: 2021, things returning to normal. Kids loved the tractors and animals. View on Flickr

item.title: On the Beach 2021
item.description: Vacation! It’s been a long strange year (plus now). About time we took a chance to get back to the beach. First time for the middle one. Great fun. Glad to be home at the end. View on Flickr

item.title: McCormick's Creek 2021
item.description: Another camping trip with a number of other families. Great fun. Beautiful–if a touch cool–weather. View on Flickr

item.title: Late April Snow
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Walk
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Spring In Kyana
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Eagle Creek Melting
item.description: After weeks of cold, it’s nice to be out and about again. View on Flickr

item.title: Snow Days (2021)
item.description: Another few snow days, up to a foot. Lots of playing and sledding. View on Flickr

item.title: A Park Meeting
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Walking in Winter
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Spring Mills 2020
item.description: Tradition! We’ve hiked Spring Mills each day after Thanksgiving for several years now. Certainly beats waiting in lines (especially with COVID-19…). And it was a lovely fall day for it. View on Flickr

item.title: Fungus Among Us
item.description: I love taking pictures of mushrooms and other fungi. They’re just so cool looking! View on Flickr

item.title: Yellow Birch Ravine
item.description: A tiny out of the way nature preserve. Beautiful. View on Flickr

item.title: Creek Stomping
item.description: Hiking and creek stomping (and dueling with weeds)! View on Flickr

item.title: Camping at Whitewater Memorial
item.description: View on Flickr

item.title: Camping at Indiana Dunes
item.description: Last one of the seasons. Cold, but well worth it. View on Flickr

item.title: Camping at Turkey Run
item.description: Another camping trip! It’s so beautiful at Turkey Run. Well worth the trip. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: Pecar Park
item.description: Another fun run! And surprise pigeons and turtles. That’s always fun. View on Flickr

item.title: Bugs etc (Macros)
item.description: I love taking close up shots of bugs/spiders/and other creepy crawlies. They’re just so weird looking. View on Flickr

item.title: Camping at McCormick's Creek
item.description: Another camping trip. We should have started this sooner, but the second best time is today. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: McCloud
item.description: Another fun run. More of a mosey and play in the woods, but that works too. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: Avon Town Hall
item.description: Only 1 little this time, but that makes it all the more special. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: Williams
item.description: Cranky toddler and a lot of sun, but still worth doing. View on Flickr

item.title: Hidden World
item.description: There are hints of another world all around us. With a bit of photo manipulation magic, I’m playing around with the idea of bringing it out. View on Flickr

item.title: Bridlewood
item.description: One of the last times out that way. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: Gary Eakin Park
item.description: Another fun run! It rained partway through, so we hid in the woods. View on Flickr

item.title: Brown County Camping Adventure
item.description: Camping with friends and grandparents! We need to do more of this. View on Flickr

item.title: Fun Run 2020: Washington Township
item.description: Second fun run with a photoset. It’s a beautiful park. View on Flickr
